#include <iostream>
#include <vector>
#include <algorithm>
#include <limits.h>
#include <cstdio>
#include <math.h>
#include <cstdlib>
#include <map>
#include <cstring>
#define ll long long int 

using namespace std;

int main()
{
   long long int test;
   cin >> test;
   while(test--) {
       long long int n, i, j = 0, k, h, d, m;
      cin >> n;
      ll a[n];
      for(i = 0; i < n; i++) {
          cin >> a[i];
          j += a[i];
      }
      k = 2*j + n - n * n;
      if(k % (2*n) == 0) {
          k  = k / (2*n);
          j = 0;
          for(i = 0; i < n; i++) {
              if(a[i] - k > 0) {
                  j += a[i] - k;
              }
              k++;
          }
          cout << j << endl;
      }
      else {
          cout << - 1 << endl;
      }
   }
    return 0;
}
